mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions (guid, from_account_id, to_account_id, customer_id, transaction_type, amount, currency, description, status, failure_reason, created_at) VALUES (#{guid}, #{fromAccountId}, #{toAccountId}, #{customerId}, #{transactionType}, #{amount}, #{currency}, #{description}, #{status}, #{failureReason}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, guid, from_account_id as fromAccountId, to_account_id as toAccountId, customer_id as customerId, transaction_type as transactionType, amount, currency, description, status, failure_reason as failureReason, created_at as createdAt, completed_at as completedAt FROM transactions WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, guid, from_account_id as fromAccountId, to_account_id as toAccountId, customer_id as customerId, transaction_type as transactionType, amount, currency, description, status, failure_reason as failureReason, created_at as createdAt, completed_at as completedAt FROM transactions WHERE guid = #{guid}

SELECT id, guid, from_account_id as fromAccountId, to_account_id as toAccountId, customer_id as customerId, transaction_type as transactionType, amount, currency, description, status, failure_reason as failureReason, created_at as createdAt, completed_at as completedAt FROM transactions WHERE from_account_id = #{accountId} OR to_account_id = #{accountId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, guid, from_account_id as fromAccountId, to_account_id as toAccountId, customer_id as customerId, transaction_type as transactionType, amount, currency, description, status, failure_reason as failureReason, created_at as createdAt, completed_at as completedAt FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, guid, from_account_id as fromAccountId, to_account_id as toAccountId, customer_id as customerId, transaction_type as transactionType, amount, currency, description, status, failure_reason as failureReason, created_at as createdAt, completed_at as completedAt FROM transactions ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE transactions SET status = #{status}, completed_at = CASE WHEN #{status} = 'COMPLETED' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN #{status} = 'FAILED' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN #{status} = 'CANCELLED' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ELSE completed_at END WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE transactions SET status = #{status}, description = #{description}, failure_reason = #{failureReason}, completed_at = CASE WHEN #{status} = 'COMPLETED' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN #{status} = 'FAILED' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN #{status} = 'CANCELLED' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ELSE completed_at END WHERE id = #{id}
